page.title: 10Havenfield
page.content: Havenfield is an Old People's Home. It has 43 old persons and the oldest is a lady of 102 years old. The conditions there are good, there are bedrooms where the residents sleep. They have beds,drawers to keep their clothes in and some have their own televisions. There are rest rooms where they can sit and talk to each other and visitors. Havenfield is kept clean and tidy. There is a garden and some of the residents like to work in it. The staff are very friendly and care for the residents well. I think Havenfield is a very important place because it cares for Darfield's old people. If Havenfield was not there the old people would not get the care and attention they really need.
